section.heading: Rules.
section.text: The Mayor shall issue rules necessary to carry out the provisions of this chapter and to provide for the granting of extensions of time within which to perform the duties imposed by this chapter, in accordance with subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2.

annotations.annotation: Delegation of authority pursuant to Law 6-168, see Mayor’s Order 87-90, April 20, 1987.
